In England, in the seven days to 03 March, there were 37,164 new confirmed cases (66.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 February, there were 58,047 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 36% (20,883 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 March is 3,698,242 (6,570.3 cases per 100,000 population).
